Text: RE Gas flow and prepayment schedule through Cc Chris If you send me an email this afternoon with the estimated amount I assume it will be MM and the net benefitcost to the estate I will add the amount to the summary for discussion with the Cash Committee on Monday If we get the request signed on Monday we should have no problem sending the wire on Tuesday as long as Larry Cash reserves the cash for Tuesday Drew Original Message From Germany Chris Sent Friday April AM To Hamic Priscilla Kanellopoulos Drew Sewell Doug Helton Susan Cc McMichael Jr Ed Polsky Phil Dhont Margaret Subject RE Gas flow and prepayment schedule through Drew I need to send out a payment of about million next Tuesday to Reliant The price is based off the NYMEX settle for today which we wont know until after PM And I prefer to wait until the day after NYMEX settles so I can see the price in a published document like Gas Daily This puts us in a bit of a bind What I can do is prepare the cash request form today based off the NYMEX settle that means you wont get it from me until after PM Monday morning I will verify the price in print and get the signed wire request to you before AM assuming Margaret Ed and Susan are all available to sign it Phil already has an estimate for these amounts on the Gas Cash Forcast worksheet Let me know if this works for you Original Message From Hamic Priscilla Sent Friday April AM To Germany Chris Subject RE Gas flow and prepayment schedule through Chris please send me the wire information for Tuesday as soon as possible We are packing up to move today Thanks Original Message From Germany Chris Sent Friday April AM To Germany Chris Jim Taylor Email Cc Pete Torres Email Shawn Kirkpatrick Email Hamic Priscilla Dhont Margaret Polsky Phil Tiffanie Wheeler Email Brady Kevin Kelly Katherine L Greif Donna Subject Gas flow and prepayment schedule through Melissa I requested a prepament of to be wire on Monday On Tuesday you will receive our prepayment for the baseload deals we did for May about million or so depending on where NX settles at today Our current cash balance for the swing gas is about after making purchases for the weekend Thanks File ENAReliant Prepayxls
